biography: Lassi is a highly accomplished golfer who has made a significant impact on the Hector Trophée invitational. Representing Lakeside Golf Vammala, Lassi consistently demonstrates exceptional skill and determination on the course.

His dedication to the tournament is evident in his remarkable record of four consecutive appearances, beginning in 2022.  While the Hector Trophée team competition has eluded him thus far, Lassi’s individual prowess has earned him well-deserved recognition.

Most notably, Lassi secured the Victor trophy in 2022, solidifying his status as one of the tournament’s top individual players.  This victory underscores his ability to perform under pressure and consistently deliver impressive scores.  Golf enthusiasts eagerly anticipate Lassi’s continued participation in the Hector Trophée and look forward to witnessing his future achievements.
